transcript:
I remember when I was younger I was
extremely pessimistic I could find the
negative in anything I was like a
negative seeking person but for so long
I've been trying to find the positive
trying to find the positive trying to
find the positive when anything bad
happens whenever happens hits
the fan whatever it is I try to find the
positive in it then now it's more of a
natural thought for the first thought to
be something of like hey how can we turn
this into something amazing so if you
have the ants that pop up the automatic
negative thoughts they will still pop up
sometimes but you have to have some sort
of a plan of when this net automatic
negative thought the ant pops up this is
what I'm going to switch it to
